<About Me />

I'm Monit Khatri, an Associate Consultant by day and a hacker by night. As a passionate CTF player and Bug Bounty hunter, I‚Äôve earned accolades for my skills in identifying vulnerabilities and securing the digital landscape. Awarded by platforms like CapturetheBug, ImpactGuru, and Bugbase for uncovering critical bugs, I constantly push the limits of my knowledge to find and exploit flaws. I thrive in the world of ethical hacking, where every challenge is an opportunity to sharpen my skills and contribute to a more secure cyber world. Always learning, always hacking, and always on the hunt for the next bug to crush.
